metadata.statement: Write an algorithm to print 'Hello' and your name in a separate line.

solutions.code: using System;using System.Collections.Generic;using System.Linq;using System.Text;using System.Threading.Tasks;namespace Basics_Training{class Program{static void Main(string[] args){Console.WriteLine('Enter your name');string YourName = Console.ReadLine();Console.WriteLine('Hello{0}', YourName);}}}

metadata.statement: Write a program to print on screen the output of adding, subtracting, multiplying and dividing of two numbers which will be entered by the user.

solutions.code: using System;public class Exercise7{public static void Main(){Console.Write('Enter a number: ');int num1= Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());Console.Write('Enter another number: ');int num2= Convert.ToInt32(Console.ReadLine());Console.WriteLine('{0} + {1} = {2}', num1, num2, num1+num2);Console.WriteLine('{0} - {1} = {2}', num1, num2, num1-num2);Console.WriteLine('{0} x {1} = {2}', num1, num2, num1*num2);Console.WriteLine('{0} / {1} = {2}', num1, num2, num1/num2);Console.WriteLine('{0} mod {1} = {2}', num1, num2, num1%num2);}}
